name: WGT Golf
summary: Experience iconic golf courses like Pebble Beach, St Andrews and Wolf Creek in the most realistic free golf game, now available on PC, Mac and Steam. Connect with millions of players all over the world!

name: WGT Baseball
summary: Build your baseball team and play against friends in this officially licensed MLB baseball game.

name: WGT by Topgolf
summary:
Take the game you love on the go with Topgolf's #1 free golf game on iOS & Android. Play world-famous courses like Pebble Beach, PGA National, and St Andrews without sacrificing realism and authenticity.

Battle players around the world in multiplayer mode or have fun solo as you level up and collect prizes. Join a country club, enter tournaments and master the world of golf from anywhere with the most realistic golf game around.

name: WGT Baseball MLB
summary: An official Major League Baseball licensed game with Hall of Fame MLB players and all your favorite MLB teams in turbo time! This is not a hardcore simulation game, just simple, clean, fast baseball fun, combining interactive batting action and strategic management. Collect Hall of Fame MLB players, hit homeruns and dominate your League Division. Featuring all 30 MLB teams including: Cardinals, Cubs, Dodgers, Giants, Mets, Orioles, Phillies, Rangers, Red Sox, Royals, Tigers, Yankees and more...

name: WGRealms: Demon Throne
summary: WGRealms: Demon Throne is a standalone Duke Nukem 3D Total Conversion though the Eduke32 source port. A remake of WGRealms 2: Siege Breaker and sequel to WGRealms, It follows The Duke over 3 different realms with a dark fantasy/medieval theme and boasts 25 levels, 20 new enemies and 10 new bosses, as well as all new graphics, a whole arsenal of new weapons and two playable characters, Duke Nukem and Jedrik.

name: WGT Golf: Birdie Bundle
summary: Improving your short game is key to lowering your scores, and this heavily discounted bundle will get you on track toward more birdies.

name: WGT Golf: Long Drive Bundle
summary:
Packed with power and value, this bundle is designed to take you farther off the tee - as you may have guessed! The best part is players at all levels will benefit from these premium upgrades.

The Long Drive Bundle includes:

- Titleist TS2 Driver (L0+): Your drive sets the tone for each hole, so make them count with this popular upgrade improving your overall distance and forgiveness
- 6x Titleist Pro V1x Ultra Slow Meter Vapor Balls (L0+): These top performing golf balls slow down the swing meter to help you hit more accurately and consistently, plus the added vapor trail makes each shot easier to track
- 2,000 WGT Credits: Visit the Pro Shop to find more equipment upgrades to pair with the above, and fresh new apparel items for your golfer
- 100,000 Coins: Test your skills in multiplayer games or rent special clubs in the Pro Shop
- 5x Platinum Apparel Packs: Give your golfer its own style with unique apparel items, including hats, shirts, gloves, pants and shoes, that will improve both their performance and appearance
- Immediately unlock all courses

name: WG Mega
summary: Over 40 levels by William Gee. 4 FULL singleplayer Episodes and 1 dukematch.

name: WGSpace
summary: WGSpace episode is a 8 level episode for Duke Nukem 3D.

name: WGRealms
summary: WGRealms is a 5 level adventure Episode for DukeNukem 3D
